name: Eleven Commandments
description:
"Look, I am coming soon!

My reward is with me, and I will give to each person,

according to what they've done". (Revelations 22:12)

Eleven Commandments is a high fantasy RPG game which adapts some of the strangest Bible stories merged in an original epic story.

Synopsis

Mankind has gone too far with its transgressions, the LORD's patience is at its limit, so he shall awake the Beast and destroy the world of Elucis to start anew. But what if there was a chance that he could change his mind?  Join Adam on a quest to save his doomed world, and experience an original story based on some of the Bible's strangest ones!

Features
  • An original epic story based on those from the Bible, with one main plot and three subplots.
  • Monsters and enemies based on biblical mythology, history and folklore, merged with classic RPG monsters.
  • An open world with plenty of secrets.
  • The classic turn based battle system.
  • Classes and Job Points system.
Main cast

                       ADAM                      MARY           TAMARA                   JONAH

Disclaimer

All the biblical adaptations in this game are for didactic purposes. It's not this project intention to offend anyone with this.
